ic.label: Administrative services fees cover the processing of claims, offering access to our provider networks and clinical programs, and responding to customer service inquiries from members of self-funded groups. Revenues from providing these administrative services are recognized in the period services are performed.

cf.label: The change in the book overdraft liability.
The change in the securities lending invested collateral asset taking into consideration any unrealized gains or losses.
The change in the value of the collateral that the entity receives as financings (typically cash) in exchange for securities lent. This item represents the change in the liability.
Receipts from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, or CMS, for reinsurance and low-income cost subsidies that represent payments for prescription drug costs for which we are not at risk.
Payments to the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, or CMS, for reinsurance and low-income cost subsidies associated with prescription drug costs for which we are not at risk.
